sentences: The COP agrees that appropriate modalities for burden sharing need to be developed.
It confirms the establishment of the adaptation fund to finance concrete adaptation projects in Parties to the Protocol.
The adaptation fund is to be financed from the share of proceeds on the CDM project activities and other sources of funding.
Annex I Parties are invited to provide this additional funding.
The fund is to be operated by an entity operating the financial mechanism of the UNFCCC.
enb_long_title: SIXTH CONFERENCE OF THE PARTIES TO THE UN FRAMEWORK CONVENTION ON CLIMATE CHANGE RESUMED SESSION
